release.name: Octo-Pie API v1.2.0
release.body: This release introduces authentication endpoints, comment support, and several improvements to blog post APIs.

prs.title: feat(api): add login endpoint for authentication
prs.body: Introduces `/auth/login` endpoint for user authentication with username/password. Returns JWT on success.

prs.title: feat(api): add support for comments
prs.body: Introduces `/comments` endpoint to allow posting comments tied to blog posts.

prs.title: fix(api): improve error handling for post fetch
prs.body: Now returns proper `404` instead of `500` when a post is not found.

prs.title: docs: add OpenAPI examples for new endpoints
prs.body: Enhanced the OpenAPI spec with request/response examples for `/auth/login` and `/comments`.

issues.title: Login endpoint needed
issues.body: Users need to authenticate via username/password.

issues.title: Better error codes for posts API
issues.body: Fetching a non-existent post should return 404 instead of 500.
